title: Karuppu Nila Song Lyrics En Aasai Machan
stanzas: <div>Karuppu Nilaa Song Lyrics En Aasai Machan

Karuppu nilaa
neethaan kalanguvdhu yaen.
thuli thuliyaai kanneer
vizhuvadhu yaen.(2)

chinna maane maanguyile
un manasula enna kurai.
peththa aaththaa pol iruppen
indha boomiyil vazhum vara.

ettu dhisai yaavum
katti arasaala
vandha rasaa neethaane.

Karuppu nilaa
neethaan kalanguvdhu yaen.
thuli thuliyaai kanneer
vizhuvadhu yaen

paththu maasam maddiyendhi
peththedutha magarasi.
pachcha pulla unnavittu
ponathenni azhuthaayaa.

maaman vandhu enaikaakka
naanum vandhu unai thaakka
naam virumbum inbam ellaam
naalai varum namakkaaga.

kaalam ulla kaalam
vazhum indha paasam.
poo vizhi imai moodiye
chinna poove kannurangu.

Karuppu nilaa
neethaan kalanguvdhu yaen.
thuli thuliyaai kanneer
vizhuvadhu yaen

vanna vanna mugam kaatti
vaanavillin niram kaatti
chinna chinna mazhalai pesi
chithirampol magane vaa

sembaruthi malar pole
sokka velli mani pole.
kannam rendum minna
minna kanmaniye
madimael vaa

paattu thamizh paattu
paada adha kaettu
aadidum vilaiyaadidum
thanga thaerey neethaane.

Karuppu nilaa
neethaan kalanguvdhu yaen.
thuli thuliyaai kanneer
vizhuvadhu yaen.(2)

en maane maanguyile
un manasula enna kurai.
peththa aaththaa pol iruppen
indha boomiyil vazhum vara.

ettu dhisai yaavum
katti arasaala
vandha rasaa neethaane.

Karuppu nilaa
neethaan kalanguvdhu yaen.
thuli thuliyaai kanneer
vizhuvadhu yaen
